MPC

Class Stmt

  • java.lang.Object
    • MPC.ASTNode
      • MPC.Stmt
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StmtAssign, StmtCall, StmtCase, StmtCompound, StmtEmpty, StmtFor, StmtIf, StmtRepeat, StmtWhile

    public abstract class Stmt
extends ASTNode
    Abstract class for all statements. Statements denote algorithmic actions, and are said to be executable.
    Version:
    1.0
